item.title: Template (Step Name)
item.description: Header Header2 Header3 Header4 Feel free to duplicate this .md file as a template for the rest of the workshop. The new file should be in the same folder as this one. Adjust the titles and weights accordingly - the weight number should ideally correspond to the step number.
